scenes.sceneDescription: Chef Tinfoil huddled over a melting ice cube on a wooden table, surrounded by scribbled notes and a cracked magnifying glass.
scenes.voiceoverText: Ever wonder why ice cubes seem to melt faster when you need them most? Big Fridge is to blame!

scenes.sceneDescription: Tinfoil, in front of an open fridge that's filled with mysterious devices, is holding up an ice cube tray with a shocked expression.
scenes.voiceoverText: Ice cube trays are designed to absorb your panic energy. Your desperate need for chill accelerates the melt!

scenes.sceneDescription: Chef is in a basement, surrounded by old refrigerators. He's pointing at a motherboard with a pair of tongs.
scenes.voiceoverText: Our fridges have been spying on us! Tracked our ice usage, selling data to the highest bidder - Big Smoothie.

scenes.sceneDescription: Tinfoil, wearing oven mitts, holds up a toaster next to a melting ice cube. He's in front of a conspiracy board filled with appliance photos.
scenes.voiceoverText: They're all in on it! Toasters, ovens, even the humble spatula! A grand kitchen conspiracy!

scenes.sceneDescription: Dramatic shot of Chef Tinfoil on a rooftop, holding a molten ice cube against a twilight sky, with city lights flickering.
scenes.voiceoverText: Our kitchens are thermodynamic battlegrounds. Our ice cubes, pawns in a greater, colder war.
